full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 253 Filed 04/28/21 Page 2 of 2 LAW OFFICES OF BOBBI C. STERNHEIM The MDC should be held accountable for its violation of Ms. Maxwell's constitutional rights, her privilge of attorney-client confidentiality, and her right to protection of her confidential legal defense materials. Very truly yours, Bobbi C. Sternheim BOBBI C. STERNHEIM cc: All counsel of record MDC Legal Staff Sophia Papapetru, Esq. Nicole McFarland, Esq. John E. Wallace, Esq. 2 DOJ-OGR-00004049

text_blocks.content: LAW OFFICES OF BOBBI C. STERNHEIM

The MDC should be held accountable for its violation of Ms. Maxwell's constitutional rights, her privilge of attorney-client confidentiality, and her right to protection of her confidential legal defense materials.
cc: All counsel of record MDC Legal Staff Sophia Papapetru, Esq. Nicole McFarland, Esq. John E. Wallace, Esq.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a formal letter from Bobbi C. Sternheim to an unspecified recipient, discussing the violation of Ms. Maxwell's rights by the MDC. The document is well-formatted and printed, with no visible handwriting or stamps.
